snippet: The Day: Many New Yorkers will recognize parts of the new documentary "You've Been Trumped," which takes a dim view of Donald J. Trump for seeking to build golf courses on a delicate stretch of the Scottish coast.
abstract: The Day: Many New Yorkers will recognize parts of the new documentary "You've Been Trumped," which takes a dim view of Donald J. Trump for seeking to build golf courses on a delicate stretch of the Scottish coast.

headline.main: A Familiar Tale of Trump and Real Estate, This Time in Scotland
